sourcesContent: import axios from "axios";    import store from "../store";    export default {        name: "Login",        data: function (){            return {                token: "",                isDisabled: true,                error: null            }        },        methods: {            submit() {                axios({                    method: "post",                    url: "https://auth.scalingo.com/v1/tokens/exchange",                    auth: {                        username: '',                        password: this.token                    }                }).then(response => {                    store.dispatch('setToken', response.data.token);                    this.$router.push(this.$route.query.redirect || '/');                }).catch(e => {                    this.error = "Wrong token, please try again.";                })                //tk-us-3MXEYKKC-8A6DJtvwTFWk77VTpeW0Ef2hrBokXUhRuHIwiPo            },        },        created() {            this.$multiwatch(['token'], function() {                this.isDisabled = this.token === "";            });            if (store.state.token)                this.$router.push(this.$route.query.redirect || '/');        }    }
